title: Had championship riven prior to update

embed.description: Hey summoners, For the past year, we've been exploring ways to solve a conundrum with Limited Edition skins. Here's the crux of the issue: During events from December 2009 through October 2011, we released 34 skins for a limited time and communicated they wouldn't come back into the store.

body:
I got the Championship Riven skin back in season 2 before the 2016 update to it. So why dont I have the Legacy version? I owned the skin way before you re-released it. I find this very disappointing. I feel ripped off.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 


"Given the reduction in exclusivity, we will be providing the following compensation to the original owners of these skins:
RP equal to the price they paid for the skin
Vintage treatment in the loading screen whenever they use the skin:
Original Limited Edition skin owners will receive this exclusive summoner icon
Limited Edition skins that were once in the store but are not part of these events (Rusty Blitzcrank, Urf Warwick, Championship Riven, Riot Singed).If these skins are ever brought back, they will be treated similarly." 

I don't have the vintage border, even though I've owned it in season 2.

I want this fixed please{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I pulled up your account to look for that missing skin, and it looks like you do own both the original Championship Riven as well as the 2016 version. As far as that article is concerned, it might be a little outdated seeing as it's 4 years old, but there's a little bit you missed which says that skin wouldn't be affected by the changes you mentioned.

Hey Broporo, in this post the poster said we get rp equal to the value originally paid, if this is true I never got rp though I did get everything else, should I submit a support ticket?

No worries! Since we'll need to do a bit of digging to double check everything on your account, it'd be a little better for us to look into this skin issue through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). With a ticket we'll be able to take all the time needed to make sure you got everything you were supposed to!
